name: Appa
iucnStatus: Least concern with decreasing population trend
story: Appa was rescued by Alveus after being surrendered to a veterinarian due to neglect
conservationMission: He is an ambassador for the exotic pet trade and how it affects primate species worldwide.

name: Momo
story: Momo was rescued by Alveus after being surrendered to a veterinarian due to neglect
conservationMission: He is an ambassador for the exotic pet trade and how it affects primate species worldwide.

name: Chips Ahoy
story: Chips Ahoy was bred as a feeder rat for snakes, but she will now live out her full life at Alveus.
conservationMission: She is an ambassadors for how rodenticide use and outdoor cats affect all levels of wildlife.

name: Nilla Wafer
story: Nilla Wafer was bred as a feeder rat for snakes, but she will now live out her full life at Alveus.
conservationMission: She is an ambassadors for how rodenticide use and outdoor cats affect all levels of wildlife.

name: Henrietta
story: Henrietta was rehomed from a local farm.
conservationMission: She is an ambassador for the agricultural industry and how people can use consumer choice to impact the environment in a positive way.

name: Henrique
story: Henrique was rehomed from a local farm.
conservationMission: She is an ambassador for the agricultural industry and how people can use consumer choice to impact the environment in a positive way.

name: Nugget
story: Nugget was rehomed to Alveus because she was bullied by hens in her previous flock.
conservationMission: She is an ambassador for the agricultural industry and how people can use consumer choice to impact the environment in a positive way.

name: Oliver
story: Oliver was put in the reject/return cage at a local feed store.
conservationMission: He is an ambassador for the agricultural industry and how people can use consumer choice to impact the environment in a positive way.

name: Toaster Strudel
story: Toaster Strudel was part of an educational program at a zoo and was rehomed to Alveus.
conservationMission: He is an ambassador for how human development and invasive species can affect natural habitats and native species.

name: Puppy
story: Our emperor scorpions were born in captivity and ethically sourced.
conservationMission: He is an ambassador for the importance of invertebrates and the misconceptions they face.

name: Tortellini
story: Our emperor scorpions were born in captivity and ethically sourced.
conservationMission: He is an ambassador for the importance of invertebrates and the misconceptions they face.

name: Fenn
story: Fenn was confiscated from the illegal pet trade by California Department of Fish and Wildlife. He was then rehomed to Alveus.
conservationMission: He is an ambassador for the exploitation of wildlife in the pet trade and the fur trade.

name: Reed
story: Reed was orphaned as a wild kit and was rescued to be raised at a zoo to be an educational ambassador. He was then rehomed to Alveus.
conservationMission: He is an ambassador for the exploitation of wildlife in the pet trade and the fur trade.

name: Winnie (The Moo)
story: Winnie came from a cattle operation in Oklahoma.
conservationMission: She is an ambassador for the beef industry and how people can use their consumer choice to impact the environment in a positive way.

name: Mia
story: Mia was rehomed to Alveus as the previous sanctuary’s owner was retiring.
conservationMission: She is an ambassador for how the pet trade has affected her parrot species and many others around the world.

story: Siren was rehomed to Alveus as the previous sanctuary’s owner was retiring.
conservationMission: She is an ambassador for how the pet trade has affected her parrot species and many others around the world.

name: Moomin
story: Moomin was rehomed from a local pet owner.

name: Snork

name: Jalapeño
story: Rehomed to Alveus from a local equine rescue.

name: Stompy
story: Stompy was hatched in captivity at a zoo and was hand-raised to be the first Alveus ambassador.
conservationMission: He is an ambassador for how the exotic meat trade and the use of animal products in cosmetics has affected his species and others.

name: Georgie
iucnStatus: Least concern with decreasing population trend
story: Georgie was part of an educational program at a zoo and was rehomed to Alveus.
conservationMission: He is an ambassador for the wildlife trade and how chytrid fungus is affecting amphibian species worldwide.

name: Noodle
iucnStatus: Least concern with decreasing population trend
story: Noodle was part of an educational program at a zoo and was rehomed to Alveus.
conservationMission: She is an ambassador for how the pet trade and habitat loss has affected hers and many other reptile species worldwide.

name: Patchy
story: Patchy was rehomed to Alveus from a local breeder after it was discovered that he had a genetic defect and was missing an eye.
conservationMission: He is an ambassador for how the pet trade and habitat loss has affected his and many other reptile species worldwide.

name: Abbott
story: Abbott was brought into a wildlife rehab center as a baby. He imprinted during the rehab process and then was deemed non-releasable.
conservationMission: He is an ambassador for educating people on the misconceptions that wildlife face as well as human-wildlife conflict.

name: Coconut
story: Coconut was brought into a willdife rehab center as a baby. He imprinted during the rehab process and then was deemed non-releasable.
conservationMission: He is an ambassador for educating people on the misconceptions that wildlife face as well as human-wildlife conflict.

name: Baked Bean
story: Our cockroach colony was started with 7 roaches that were part of an educational colony at a school in Pennsylvania.
conservationMission: They are ambassadors for the importance of invertebrates and the misconceptions they face.
